mapper.select: select * from (select row_number() over(order by ${option}) line, goods.g_name, g_price, goods.g_num, gp_sysname, goods.g_option from goods left outer join goodspic on goods.g_num = goodspic.g_num where goods.e_num = #{e_num} ) where line between #{limit} and #{limit}+20

select member.email, member.grade, point, coupon.category, coupon.serial, coupon.dc, coupon.used from member left outer join coupon on member.email = coupon.email where member.email=#{value} and coupon.used = 'N'
